LORD ELDER sat on the bridge of the ARK in the large metal typically reserv=
ed as for the vessel's commander. The only light in the room came from the =
various computer readouts from the consoles positioned around the room and =
the large view screen that was positioned in front of him. The image being =
displayed was that of the jungle that had caught the attention of the MAXIM=
ALS and the PREDACONS of late. 

He had been given all the information that=
 had been available to him and it was still frustrating little. 

He reache=
d over and opened a com link and entered his own private security code into=
 it and frowned as the computer reported back, "The resource you are attemp=
ting to contact is not available."

LORD ELDER sighed as he turned to look =
back at the screen as he opened another com link, this one not needing the =
security code. "Bump. What is the status of our injured personnel?"

There =
was a pause and then BUMP responded, "Polar Claw and his team are fully rec=
overed and Nightshift is nearly complete as well, his new beast mode has be=
en fully integrated into his systems."

"Good." There was a nod from ELDER =
as BUMP was speaking. "What of Silverbolt?" ELDER asked as he glanced back =
at the screen. 

"I was touch and go for a while there." BUMP said carefull=
y, "But he is recovering nicely as well."

LORD ELDER grunted, "Excellent. =
Have them meet me in conference room 1 when they come online."

"What?" BUM=
P said as if caught of guard. "You can't be . . . "

"Yes I am." LORD ELDER=
 cut in. "You have your orders. Carry them out." ELDER's voice was uncharac=
teristically curt and commanding. There was a lot on his processor lately, =
and from the looks of things it would only get worse. 

"Of course, yes sir=
." BUMP responded in a sullen manner. He was not one to take orders easily,=
 but even he could hear something strange in ELDER's voice. 

A message was=
 sent to NIGHTSHIFT's recharging chamber indicating that when he was recove=
red to report to conference room #1.

(TAG)

Preston
